Before this trigger, set HouseController.lightStatus from false to true (e.g., via inspector or a test hook) to exercise Update() branch where currentLightStatus != lightStatus. Expected: changeLights() runs automatically from Update and switchSound.Play() is called once.

Before this trigger, set HouseController.lightStatus from true back to false to exercise the opposite transition in Update(). Expected: changeLights() runs automatically from Update and switchSound.Play() is called again.
